ca.cgjennings.spelling

Interface StringDistanceMeasurer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EditDistanceMeasurer, PhoneticDistanceMeasurer, TypistsDistanceMeasurer

    public interface StringDistanceMeasurer
    Implemented by classes that measure a kind of edit distance between strings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int distance(String candidate)
      Measure the distance between the source string and a candidate without any distance limit.
      int distance(String candidate, int limit)
      Measure the distance between the source string and a candidate.

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        int distance(String candidate)
        Measure the distance between the source string and a candidate without any distance limit.
        Parameters:
        candidate - the word to compare to the source
        Returns:
        the edit distance as defined by the implementation

      • distance

        int distance(String candidate,
             int limit)
        Measure the distance between the source string and a candidate. If limit is -1, this always computes the actual distance. If a positive limit is provided, then the algorithm may perform a short-circuit evaluation and return more quickly if it can prove that the distance must be greater than the limit. In this case the returned distance may not be accurate, but will always be greater than limit.
        Parameters:
        candidate - the word to compare to the source
        limit - a maximum distance beyond which a shortcut answer can be returned
        Returns:
        the edit distance as defined by the implementation
